toc.text: 我正在使用什么版本的 Ubuntu？

pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["本镜像仅包含 32/64 位 x86 架构处理器的软件包，在 ARM(arm64, armhf)、PowerPC(ppc64el)、RISC-V(riscv64) 和 S390x 等架构的设备上（对应官方源为 ports.ubuntu.com）请使用 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/ubuntu-ports/","children":"ubuntu-ports 镜像"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["对于 Ubuntu 不再支持的版本，请参考 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/ubuntu-old-releases/","children":"Ubuntu 旧版本帮助"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["在 Ubuntu 24.04 之前，Ubuntu 的软件源配置文件使用传统的 One-Line-Style，路径为 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/apt/sources.list"}],"；从 Ubuntu 24.04 开始，Ubuntu 的软件源配置文件变更为 DEB822 格式，路径为 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/apt/sources.list.d/ubuntu.sources"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"我正在使用什么版本的-ubuntu","children":"我正在使用什么版本的 Ubuntu？"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"可以通过以下命令查看当前系统版本："}],"
",["$r","SyntaxHighlight",null,{"code":"cat /etc/os-release","language":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"例如在 Ubuntu 24.04 下，文件内容如下："}],"
",["$r","SyntaxHighlight",null,{"code":"PRETTY_NAME="Ubuntu 24.04.1 LTS"
NAME="Ubuntu"
VERSION_ID="24.04"
VERSION="24.04.1 LTS (Noble Numbat)"
VERSION_CODENAME=noble
ID=ubuntu
ID_LIKE=debian
HOME_URL="https://www.ubuntu.com/"
SUPPORT_URL="https://help.ubuntu.com/"
BUG_REPORT_URL="https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/"
PRIVACY_POLICY_URL="https://www.ubuntu.com/legal/terms-and-policies/privacy-policy"
UBUNTU_CODENAME=noble
LOGO=ubuntu-logo"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"VERSION_ID"}]," 后面的版本号即为当前系统版本，",["$r","code",null,{"children":"VERSION_CODENAME"}]," 后面的是代号。代号在软件源配置文件中会被使用。",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"请注意在下面的配置中选择符合你的机器的版本号，在替换配置前确认代号一致，否则之后的更新操作可能导致系统出现问题。"}]]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"配置内容","children":"配置内容"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"将系统自带的对应文件做个备份，然后根据格式的选择下面对应的内容替换，即可使用选择的软件源镜像。"}],"
",["$r","h4",null,{"id":"传统格式etcaptsourceslist","children":["传统格式（",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/apt/sources.list"}],"）："]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"enableQuickSetup":true,"filepath":"/etc/apt/sources.list","menus":[{"title":"Ubuntu 版本","items":[["24.04 LTS",{"release_name":"noble"}],["25.04",{"release_name":"plucky"}],["24.10",{"release_name":"oracular"}],["22.04 LTS",{"release_name":"jammy"}]]},{"title":"使用官方安全更新软件源","items":[["是",{"security_mirror":"# ","security_official":""}],["否",{"security_mirror":"","security_official":"# "}]]},{"title":"启用 proposed","items":[["否",{"enable_proposed":"# "}],["是",{"enable_proposed":""}]]},{"title":"启用源码镜像","items":[["否",{"enable_source":"# "}],["是",{"enable_source":""}]]}],"code":"# 默认注释了源码镜像以提高 apt update 速度，如有需要可自行取消注释
deb {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/ {{release_name}} main restricted universe multiverse
{{enable_source}}deb-src {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/ {{release_name}} main restricted universe multiverse
deb {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/ {{release_name}}-updates main restricted universe multiverse
{{enable_source}}deb-src {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/ {{release_name}}-updates main restricted universe multiverse
deb {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/ {{release_name}}-backports main restricted universe multiverse
{{enable_source}}deb-src {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/ {{release_name}}-backports main restricted universe multiverse

# 以下安全更新软件源包含了官方源与镜像站配置，如有需要可自行修改注释切换
{{security_mirror}}deb {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/ {{release_name}}-security main restricted universe multiverse
{{security_mirror}}{{enable_source}}deb-src {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/ {{release_name}}-security main restricted universe multiverse

{{security_official}}deb http://security.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ {{release_name}}-security main restricted universe multiverse
{{security_official}}{{enable_source}}deb-src http://security.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ {{release_name}}-security main restricted universe multiverse

# 预发布软件源，不建议启用
{{enable_proposed}}deb {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/ {{release_name}}-proposed main restricted universe multiverse
{{enable_proposed}}{{enable_source}}deb-src {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/ {{release_name}}-proposed main restricted universe multiverse","codeLanguage":"properties"}],"
",["$r","h4",null,{"id":"deb822-格式etcaptsourceslistdubuntusources","children":["DEB822 格式（",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/apt/sources.list.d/ubuntu.sources"}],"）："]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"enableQuickSetup":true,"filepath":"/etc/apt/sources.list.d/ubuntu.sources","menus":[{"title":"Ubuntu 版本","items":[["24.04 LTS",{"release_name":"noble"}],["25.04",{"release_name":"plucky"}],["24.10",{"release_name":"oracular"}]]},{"title":"使用官方安全更新软件源","items":[["是",{"security_mirror":"# ","security_official":""}],["否",{"security_mirror":"","security_official":"# "}]]},{"title":"启用 proposed","items":[["否",{"enable_proposed":"# "}],["是",{"enable_proposed":""}]]},{"title":"启用源码镜像","items":[["否",{"enable_source":"# "}],["是",{"enable_source":""}]]}],"code":"Types: deb
URIs: {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}
Suites: {{release_name}} {{release_name}}-updates {{release_name}}-backports
Components: main restricted universe multiverse
Signed-By: /usr/share/keyrings/ubuntu-archive-keyring.gpg

# 默认注释了源码镜像以提高 apt update 速度，如有需要可自行取消注释
{{enable_source}}Types: deb-src
{{enable_source}}URIs: {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}
{{enable_source}}Suites: {{release_name}} {{release_name}}-updates {{release_name}}-backports
{{enable_source}}Components: main restricted universe multiverse
{{enable_source}}Signed-By: /usr/share/keyrings/ubuntu-archive-keyring.gpg

# 以下安全更新软件源包含了官方源与镜像站配置，如有需要可自行修改注释切换
{{security_mirror}}Types: deb
{{security_mirror}}URIs: {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}
{{security_mirror}}Suites: {{release_name}}-security
{{security_mirror}}Components: main restricted universe multiverse
{{security_mirror}}Signed-By: /usr/share/keyrings/ubuntu-archive-keyring.gpg

{{security_mirror}}{{enable_source}}Types: deb-src
{{security_mirror}}{{enable_source}}URIs: {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}
{{security_mirror}}{{enable_source}}Suites: {{release_name}}-security
{{security_mirror}}{{enable_source}}Components: main restricted universe multiverse
{{security_mirror}}{{enable_source}}Signed-By: /usr/share/keyrings/ubuntu-archive-keyring.gpg

{{security_official}}Types: deb
{{security_official}}URIs: http://security.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/
{{security_official}}Suites: {{release_name}}-security
{{security_official}}Components: main restricted universe multiverse
{{security_official}}Signed-By: /usr/share/keyrings/ubuntu-archive-keyring.gpg

{{security_official}}{{enable_source}}Types: deb-src
{{security_official}}{{enable_source}}URIs: http://security.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/
{{security_official}}{{enable_source}}Suites: {{release_name}}-security
{{security_official}}{{enable_source}}Components: main restricted universe multiverse
{{security_official}}{{enable_source}}Signed-By: /usr/share/keyrings/ubuntu-archive-keyring.gpg

# 预发布软件源，不建议启用
{{enable_proposed}}Types: deb
{{enable_proposed}}URIs: {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}
{{enable_proposed}}Suites: {{release_name}}-proposed
{{enable_proposed}}Components: main restricted universe multiverse
{{enable_proposed}}Signed-By: /usr/share/keyrings/ubuntu-archive-keyring.gpg

{{enable_proposed}}{{enable_source}}Types: deb-src
{{enable_proposed}}{{enable_source}}URIs: {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}
{{enable_proposed}}{{enable_source}}Suites: {{release_name}}-proposed
{{enable_proposed}}{{enable_source}}Components: main restricted universe multiverse
{{enable_proposed}}{{enable_source}}Signed-By: /usr/share/keyrings/ubuntu-archive-keyring.gpg","codeLanguage":"yaml"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"因镜像站同步有延迟，可能会导致生产环境系统不能及时检查、安装上最新的安全更新，不建议替换 security 源。"}]]}]

meta.title: Ubuntu 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
